name: classic race
description:
this game is for those who loves retro 2d gaming. try it and you would like it! help us improve it - bigbanggames.of@gmail.com

please help us realise it. we are the beginners and really need your help to prove ourselves.

Features:

- It's easy and really interesting

- Every new level car gets faster and faster

- Play with your friends. Try to make your highscore better than your friends' one

- If you buy this game, you will automaticly become really awesome
